name: Anton Puzzle tussle
description:
Anton Puzzle tussle is a 3D platformer game, where you must solve puzzles and use moles to get through the level!

Try getting all the golden coins and highest scores!

REMEMBER YOU CAN THROW ENEMIES WHILE MID-AIR!

----Keyboard Controls-----

  • Spacebar/K: Jump
  • Mouse Button left / J : Dash (or hold to throw when picking an enemy up)
  • Q and E : Rotate camera left and right
  • R : Reset enemies

---Xbox gamepad Controls----

  • A: Jump
  • X : Dash (or hold to throw when picking an enemy up)
  • LB and RB : Rotate camera left and right
  • RT : Reset enemies
